QuestData.Title: Good Gold For Bad Tail
QuestData.Description: I need a crateload of tail, $c! And not just any kind of tail. The tail I'm after needs to be old - ancient even. The more decrepit the better.$b$bThe scales of a basilisk's tail are unique in that they harden with age without becoming brittle. The hardened scales are ideal for the production of certain armors.$b$bIt's been many years since I've been reduced to peddling lizard scales, but who knows, maybe it'll build even more character in me! If that's even possible....
QuestData.CompletionText: How's the search for tail coming, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: That'll do, $c.$b$bA few more friends like you and I'll be back on my feet in no time!
